md:
giải nghĩa từ "panel" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Panel (noun) - Bảng điều khiển
	+ Meaning: A panel is a group of people who are chosen to discuss or decide something, or a flat piece of material, such as wood or metal, that is used to control or operate something.
	+ Example: The panel of judges selected the winner of the competition.
	+ Related words: committee, board, jury, control panel, instrument panel

* Panel (verb) - Đóng vai trò trong một bảng điều khiển
	+ Meaning: To panel something means to provide a group of people to discuss or decide something.
	+ Example: The TV show was paneled by a group of experts in the field.
	+ Related words: moderate, host, chair, facilitate

Note: The verb "panel" is not as commonly used as the noun form.

    • Example: The panel of judges selected the winner of the competition.
    • Related words: committee, board, jury, control panel, instrument panel

  • Panel (verb) - Đóng vai trò trong một bảng điều khiển

    • Meaning: To panel something means to provide a group of people to discuss or decide something.
    • Example: The TV show was paneled by a group of experts in the field.
    • Related words: moderate, host, chair, facilitate

Note: The verb "panel" is not as commonly used as the noun form.
